topic: Common customer objections to AI in energy management
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that there are assumptions or areas of my life that I routinely overlook due to familiarity or discomfort. This should help uncover any significant questions I've been avoiding, thereby enhancing my self-awareness and personal growth.
